EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Airline Operators Webinar: Honeywell Forge for Airlines
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for our webinar - Honeywell Forge for Airlines.
Please log on to the webinar by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2343704/E9CFD4957CFCA0BBEE2669DF639E44A2]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: June 03, 2020 Time: 1:00 p.m. GMT, 8:00 a.m. CT {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
